nodes.text: Nutcracker Clone Troopers were specialized clone troopers in the Grand Army of the Republic.

The armor was similar overall to the Phase I clone trooper armor used at the time of the Clone Wars, although it had heavy customizations, such as a blue and yellow color for the helmet's top, as well as the lower leg and knee armor being blue colored, the upper leg armor being largely yellow with traces of red at the top, the chest armor being primarily red save for a large white streak at the center as well as eight tiny yellow circles, with four each being on the left and right of the streak (giving the appearance of a military uniform), the pelvic armor being red and yellow, and the gauntlets being red, yellow, and white, and the shoulder armor being colored yellow in a manner reminiscient of epaulets. The helmet also had teeth-like emblems right below the visor, giving the appearance of a moustachioed mouth. The armor was generally worn on Life Day.

The clone nutcracker trooper was a purchasable outfit in the online game Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures. Being a Christmas-themed outfit, it consisted of regular clone armor with blue, yellow, red, and green holiday decorations attached to it. This outfit was only purchasable by Jedi members during Christmas time. The overall colors, as well as its name, were a reference to the Nutcracker Suite.
